response.overview: A young woman grapples with saying goodbye to her boyfriend forever. All that is left of their love is the snow angel he made for her the night before he left for good. With seasons changing rapidly, the young woman desperately tries to keep the snow angel intact. Her caring neighbours rally to help but Mother Nature always has other plans. The young woman struggles between the fight to hold onto memories, so they don't fade away forever and learning to adapt to the changing seasons.
response.title: The Snow Angel
